common.tagline: Specialty coffee for everyday life in Kojiya

hero.title: LYNO
hero.subtitle: Moments of coffee that gently light your everyday

about.title: About
about.p1: LYNO is a small specialty coffee stand just a two-minute walk from Kojiya Station. We brew each cup with care, hoping to offer a moment that helps you slow down and breathe amidst your everyday routine.
about.p2: Whether it’s on your way to work, after a long day, or during a quiet walk with family, we invite you to enjoy a cup that feels refined, warm, and naturally part of daily life.

news.title: News
news.description: Updates on opening hours, limited menus, and other announcements.
news.empty: There are no announcements at the moment.

menu.title: Menu
menu.description: Our menu is designed primarily for takeaway, making it easy to enjoy in everyday moments. For pour-over coffee, you can choose from our selection of beans. All syrups are made from sugarcane and contain no artificial sweeteners.

beans.title: Beans
beans.description: We carefully select several distinctive coffees. Small quantities are also available, so feel free to try something new.
beans.empty: There are no beans available at the moment.

access.title: Access
access.description: A two-minute walk from Keikyu Kojiya Station, and about 15 minutes from Haneda Airport.
